questions.question: Choose the correct form: She ___ the letter before I arrived.
What is the structure of Past Perfect?
Fill in the blank: They ___ (not finish) work when we called.
When do we use Past Perfect?
options: For action before another past action
questions.correctAnswer: For action before another past action

questions.question: Fill in the blank: After I ___ (eat), I washed the dishes.
Which sentence shows correct order of events?
options: I had eaten before I went to bed.
I went to bed before I had eaten.
I eat before I went to bed.
I was eating before I went to bed.
questions.correctAnswer: I had eaten before I went to bed.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: By the time we arrived, the film ___ (already start).
What is the question form for 'he had left'?
Fill in the blank: She was tired because she ___ (not sleep) well.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: When I got home, my sister cooked dinner.
When I got home, my sister had cooked dinner.
When I got home, my sister has cooked dinner.
When I got home, my sister was cooking dinner.
questions.correctAnswer: When I got home, my sister had cooked dinner.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: They realized they ___ (lose) their way.
Which conjunction is often used with Past Perfect?
Fill in the blank: Before I met her, I ___ (never see) such beauty.
What is the negative form of 'I had finished'?
Fill in the blank: The train ___ (already leave) when we reached the station.
